Please analyze the query and return the most suitable category from the list above. If the query does not fit perfectly into one category, select the category that best matches the main topic of the query. Only return intent category text and don't return any other words or numbers.
Query: How are exchange rates calculated at this bank?
Intent: exchange_rate

Query: Help me verify my identification.
Intent: unable_to_verify_identity

Query: Are there steps I need to take before my card expires?
Intent: card_about_to_expire

Query: How much are you going to charge me if I top up my US card?
Intent: top_up_by_card_charge

Query: Why was the wrong rate applied when I bought something in a different currency?
Intent: card_payment_wrong_exchange_rate

Query: Why would there be an extra charge on my app?
Intent: extra_charge_on_statement

Query: It seems I've suddenly been charged for my recent ATM cash withdrawal. What's up with that? I though withdrawals are free, you never charged me so far!
Intent: cash_withdrawal_charge

Query: Will you tell me how I am supposed to use the disposable cards?
Intent: get_disposable_virtual_card

Query: Explain why my top up would be reverted.
Intent: top_up_reverted

Query: How do I shut down my account and get out of this company?
Intent: terminate_account

Query: How do I dispute a direct debit that I didn't do?
Intent: direct_debit_payment_not_recognised

Query: Why was there an extra charge when I transferred money?
Intent: transfer_fee_charged

Query: How come when I tried to pay contactless at the bus it didnt work?
Intent: contactless_not_working

Query: Could you please recommend what I should do if my card keeps getting declined?  I planned to top-up today but I am unable to get it to work.  I need a fast solution to this problem.
Intent: top_up_failed

Query: My account is blocked because I entered the wrong pin too many times.  Help me unblock.
Intent: pin_blocked

Query: I think my card has been compromised in some way.
Intent: compromised_card

Query: Can I order another card?
Intent: getting_spare_card

Query: There is a repeat charge for the same item
Intent: transaction_charged_twice

Query: I can't find the card PIN.
Intent: get_physical_card

Query: How can I find out the source of my available cash?
Intent: verify_source_of_funds

Query: My card was not accepted in a shop
Intent: declined_card_payment

Query: Where in the European Union can I get a card?
Intent: country_support

Query: How many transactions can I make on my disposable card?
Intent: disposable_card_limits

Query: Why do I need to verify my account?
Intent: why_verify_identity

Query: I need to add more funds to my card today because it keeps being declined, and I need to use it immediately. Can you fix this or tell me alternatives?
Intent: top_up_failed

Query: Can you issue both a Visa and a Mastercard to me?
Intent: visa_or_mastercard

Query: I have been waiting for my card payment to be moved from pending status for an unusually long time.  What is going on here and do you have an idea of when I can expect it to go through?
Intent: pending_card_payment

Query: Am I able to top up with this cheque I received?
Intent: top_up_by_cash_or_cheque

Query: How long does a transfer transaction take?
Intent: transfer_timing

Query: Do you guys have any age restrictions?
Intent: age_limit

Query: How do I use cash to top up my account?
Intent: top_up_by_cash_or_cheque

Query: Can my friend send me money?
Intent: receiving_money

Query: I'd like to open an account for my children. How can I do that?
Intent: age_limit

Query: Help, the ATM didn't give me all the money I requested
Intent: wrong_amount_of_cash_received

Query: Where do I get a virtual card?
Intent: getting_virtual_card

Query: How to order a virtual card
Intent: getting_virtual_card

Query: My credit card has been declined.
Intent: declined_card_payment

Query: I didn't receive the correct exchange rate when I got cash.
Intent: wrong_exchange_rate_for_cash_withdrawal

Query: I made a cash deposit and the balance wasn't updated.
Intent: balance_not_updated_after_cheque_or_cash_deposit

Query: How do I get a card if I live in the US?
Intent: country_support

Query: Why are you keeping my money from me by declining my card? What is going on?
Intent: top_up_failed

Query: After I deposited my cash, I still don't see it in my account.
Intent: balance_not_updated_after_cheque_or_cash_deposit

Query: Will you charge an extra fee for top ups?
Intent: top_up_by_card_charge

Query: what cards can i use to add money to my account
Intent: supported_cards_and_currencies

Query: Why would a transfer to a beneficiary not go through?
Intent: beneficiary_not_allowed

Query: I am paid by my employer in GBP; do I need to do anything in the app to indicate this?
Intent: receiving_money

Query: Can someone else use my account if they have my phone?  I lost mine.
Intent: lost_or_stolen_phone

Query: Do you charge for sending more cards?
Intent: getting_spare_card

Query: Hey there, I just went through my most recent credit card payments and I notice the same charge for a restaurant was processed twice. There was only one meal at this place, so I would like one of the charges to be reversed and my money to be put back in the account.
Intent: transaction_charged_twice

Query: I have a service fee that I've never seen before. It showed up after I bought something from an international seller online.
Intent: transfer_fee_charged

Query: What steps do I need to do to delete my account?
Intent: terminate_account

Intent: contactless_not_working

Intent: top_up_by_bank_transfer_charge

Query: When will I get my money? It's been too long.
Intent: transfer_not_received_by_recipient

Query: I have a card payment that has been pending for some time and would like to know when it is going to go through.
Intent: pending_card_payment

Query: Why was my transaction declined?
Intent: failed_transfer

Query: My account shows a direct debit charge that I have never seen before
Intent: direct_debit_payment_not_recognised

Query: You accepts my card?
Intent: card_acceptance

Query: How do I make a currency exchange?
Intent: exchange_via_app

Query: Is there a topping up limit?
Intent: top_up_limits

Query: How to unblock my PIN?
Intent: pin_blocked

Query: I attempted to get money in cash but it was refused!
Intent: declined_cash_withdrawal

Query: How do I dispute a direct debit transaction?
Intent: direct_debit_payment_not_recognised

Query: Why was I charged a random fee for a transfer I made?
Intent: transfer_fee_charged

Query: Will my money be of equal value when I travel abroad?
Intent: exchange_rate

Query: What should I do if I have used all of my PIN tries?
Intent: pin_blocked

Query: Why isn't top-up working? My top-up money disappeared after I saw that it was successfully transferred. Is it gone? Where did it go?
Intent: top_up_reverted

Query: My card payment was cancelled it seems.
Intent: reverted_card_payment?

Query: I'm dissatisfied with the service and would like to terminate the account.
Intent: terminate_account

Query: I tried to pay with my card and it didn't work
Intent: declined_card_payment

Query: Why is there a pending hold on one pound on my statement?
Intent: extra_charge_on_statement

Query: Would I need to pay extra for currency exchanges?
Intent: exchange_charge

Query: Why do you need me to do an identity check?
Intent: why_verify_identity

Query: Is there a way I can get a Visa card?
Intent: visa_or_mastercard

Query: What do I do if my PIN was blocked?
Intent: pin_blocked

Query: My app shows a direct debit that isn't mine.
Intent: direct_debit_payment_not_recognised

Query: Can a friend top up my account
Intent: topping_up_by_card

Query: How can I go about ordering a virtual card?
Intent: getting_virtual_card

Query: Why hasn't my cheque processed?
Intent: balance_not_updated_after_cheque_or_cash_deposit

Query: I'm suddenly getting an error while attempting a transfer that it isn't possible. Why? I've done it before.
Intent: beneficiary_not_allowed

Query: Hello, Just now i got to know withdrawal of money from of my account. As someone used my card to withdraw amount in any odd remote area. Since i have not been in that area, please freeze my card immediately.
Intent: cash_withdrawal_not_recognised

Query: Give me back my money, I'm not paying the sellers. It has been a long time ago that I made an order and it just isn't coming.
Intent: request_refund

Intent: topping_up_by_card

Intent: transfer_into_account

Intent: beneficiary_not_allowed

Intent: pending_transfer

Query: What's wrong with my ID? I can't verify it.
Intent: unable_to_verify_identity

Query: Transaction refund missing from my statement.
Intent: Refund_not_showing_up

Query: I just realized I made the wrong transaction  yesterday. Would  you please make it correct?I need it by tomorrow.
Intent: cancel_transfer

Query: I'm waiting for my transaction to complete.
Intent: transfer_not_received_by_recipient

Query: Can I use app to unblock my card?
Intent: pin_blocked

Query: How long does it take for money to transfer as my balance hasn't been updated
Intent: balance_not_updated_after_bank_transfer

Query: Please update me on whether you have received the funds for the refund of the large purchase I made recently. I have requested this from the merchant days ago but still haven't got anything.
Intent: Refund_not_showing_up

Query: Is it possible to get a card outside the UK?
Intent: country_support

Query: My account is  new  why can I  not top up
Intent: pending_top_up

Query: Your exchange rates are coming from where?
Intent: exchange_rate

Query: Why isn't my purchase exchange rate correct?
Intent: card_payment_wrong_exchange_rate

Query: Are extra cards free?
Intent: getting_spare_card

Query: How long do top-ups take to go through
Intent: pending_top_up

Query: Can I have my card delivered on a specific day?
Intent:
